description: A Flutter provider class that manages the state of notes, including CRUD operations and search filtering. It interacts with a repository to load, save, update, and delete notes, and exposes various getters and methods for UI components.

classes.name: NotesProvider
classes.description: A ChangeNotifier class that manages notes data and provides CRUD and search functionalities for UI components.

methods.name: NotesProvider
methods.description: Constructor that initializes the provider with a notes repository.

methods.name: isLoading
methods.description: Getter that indicates if a loading operation is in progress.

methods.name: _setLoading
methods.description: Private method to update the loading state and notify listeners.

methods.name: notes
methods.description: Getter that returns an unmodifiable list of all loaded notes.

methods.description: Getter that returns the current search query.

methods.name: setQuery
methods.description: Method to update the search query and notify listeners.

methods.name: filteredNotes
